channel.title: Comments on: Adding new nodes to Cassandra cluster

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: BTW, it seems things like Cassandra are trying to solve the problem of data growth, it is not pure high performance oriented solution, so in real world I may still need things like memcached.
item.content:encoded: BTW, it seems things like Cassandra are trying to solve the problem of data growth, it is not pure high performance oriented solution, so in real world I may still need things like memcached.
